body_html:
Thanks for the report @yaroslavvb .

On further investigation, I don't think this is uninitialized memory but rather an intentional random number. This number is initialized to a random value when a Device object is constructed .

Closing this out. Feel free to re-open/file a new issue if you think there still is a problem.

Thanks!
body_text:
Thanks for the report @yaroslavvb .
On further investigation, I don't think this is uninitialized memory but rather an intentional random number. This number is initialized to a random value when a Device object is constructed .
Closing this out. Feel free to re-open/file a new issue if you think there still is a problem.

body:
Thanks for the report @yaroslavvb .

On further investigation, I don't think this is uninitialized memory but rather an intentional random number. This number is initialized to a random value when a [`Device` object is constructed](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/754048a0453a04a761e112ae5d99c149eb9910dd/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device.cc#L43) .

Closing this out. Feel free to re-open/file a new issue if you think there still is a problem.

Thanks!
